posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Any form of payment accepted.  

Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours (mainly depending on when bars close :rolleyes:). Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.
4 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.

I have over 200 T206 up on ebay at the moment.  ebay id -- sg713

1 -- Any common card listed at $20.90 or $21.91 (plus $2 s/h) can be had here for $19, delivered. 

2 -- Any HOF or SL listed at $59.95 (plus $2 s/h) can be had here for $54, delivered. 

3 -- The few other higher priced commons I'll take offers on.


For some reason ebay link won't work, but, again, id ------> sg713


Thanks, Scott

No link.
Here you go everyone:
